Message.Jp: 遭遇した敵を討伐する

Message.En:
In the <NAME AREA> area, 
there is growing concern among the locals 
about unidentified assailants.
Message.Jp:
<NAME AREA>あたりで
正体不明の襲撃者を警戒する民が増えている

Message.En:
Nowadays, perhaps due to the abundance of 
high-performance weapons and armor, 
there has been an increase in 
inexperienced hunters who desire items 
beyond their capabilities. 
It's troublesome when they come and disturb our 
hunting grounds. 
Currently, the presence of monsters in this 
area is just right. 
I hope these beginners will quickly retreat.
Message.Jp:
いまどきは性能のいい武器や防具が出回るせいか
腕に見合わないエモノを狩りたがるヒヨッ子が増えた
こっちの狩場を荒らされちゃあ困るんだ
このあたりは今
いい感じに魔物の気配が集まっている
初心者どもはさっさと退散してくれないもんかね
遭遇した敵を討伐する
